item.title: Blocked drain, 23rd January
item.description:

item.title: Several wide potholes in southbound lane between these two junctions, 23rd January
item.description:
Several wide potholes have opened up on Highbury New Park southbound lane between junctions with Highbury Quadrant and Collins Road. The top layer (around 70mm) of road has come away revealing a flat layer below.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 169-191, Highbury New Park, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Usual fly tipped rubbish and tipped commercial waste bags, 23rd January
item.description:
Can’t something be done about this corner? Commercial waste left for hours, sometimes days on end just attracts other waste
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Pellerin Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole in eastbound lane just after roundabout, 23rd January
item.description:
A large pothole has opened up here after recent rains. It is just after the exit to the roundabout so is hidden from view until you're almost on top of it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Highbury Quadrant, Highbury, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Loose gravel for pot holes causing damage to cars, 23rd January
item.description:
Throughout Mounthurst Road there are several pot holes. Temporary repairs are done but this is now causing loose gravel to be on the road with damage to cars paint work being an issue. The pot holes just keep opening back up. Resurfacing of the road is needed urgently.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mounthurst Road, Hayes, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Uneven manhole cover on pavement - trip hazard, 23rd January
item.description:
• Please give brief details of your complaint or compliment below: Today around 14.10pm 22/01/26 on my way to paying a bill on Bromley high Street near the junction opposite British heart foundation l found myself on the floor surrounded by two passers by who help me to my feet..l apparently trip over a man hole which was uneven..l have a grass left knee and either broken or sprained finger on my right hand which l will attempt to go to A & E • What action (if any) would you like us to take? Investigate and take further action to prevent serious injury

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, High Street, Widmore, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish outside home for years, 23rd January
item.description:
This rubbish/ rubble inside a front garden but it has been like this for YEARS. The bin inside is constantly being filled with rubbish of passersby. The council never or rarely collects it because it’s not accessible behind rubble bags. 45 Millfields rd

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Millfields Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Regular fly tipping from one property, 23rd January
item.description:
There's regular fly tipping here, bathtub, fridge freezer, floorboards, microwave, etc spread across weeks. We THINK it could be 13 Jarrow way since they have been doing renovations, but not sure.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Jarrow Way, Hackney, London
